mapper.select:
SELECT count(*) FROM TB_TR01M01 M LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_BM02M01 B ON M.TRANS_CLNT_CD = B.CLNT_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_BM02M01 BF ON M.TRANS_FROM = BF.CLNT_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_BM02M01 BT ON M.TRANS_TO = BT.CLNT_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CR02M01 CM ON CM.CO_CD = M.TRANS_ORDRS_CO_CD AND CM.ORDRS_NO = M.TRANS_ORDRS_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_BM02M01 D ON D.CLNT_CD = CM.ORDRS_CLNT_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CM06M01 U ON U.ID = M.TRANS_MNG_ID WHERE 1=1
AND M.CO_CD = #{coCd}
AND M.TRANS_DT BETWEEN TO_DATE( #{reqDtFrom},'YYYYMMDD') AND TO_DATE( #{reqDtTo},'YYYYMMDD')
AND M.TRANS_ORDRS_NO LIKE '%'||#{ordrsNo}||'%'
AND BF.CLNT_NM LIKE '%'||#{transFromNm}||'%'
AND BT.CLNT_NM LIKE '%'||#{transToNm}||'%'
AND U.NAME LIKE '%'||#{mngIdNm}||'%'
AND NVL2(M.TRANS_PMNT_DT,'Y','N') = #{cmpletYn} --지급일자가 있으면'Y'=지급, null 이면 'N'=미지급

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, A.*
FROM (
SELECT M.FILE_TRGT_KEY , M.CO_CD , TO_CHAR(M.TRANS_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS TRANS_DT , M.TRANS_MNG_ID , (SELECT FN_CM06M01_ID_TO_NM(M.TRANS_MNG_ID) FROM DUAL) TRANS_MNG_ID_NM , M.TRANS_FROM , BF.CLNT_NM AS TRANS_FROM_NM , M.TRANS_TO , BT.CLNT_NM AS TRANS_TO_NM , M.TRANS_TYPE , FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(M.TRANS_TYPE) AS TRANS_TYPE_NM , M.TRANS_VEHICLE , FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(M.TRANS_VEHICLE) AS TRANS_VEHICLE_NM , M.TRANS_WEIGHT , M.TRANS_CLNT_CD , B.CLNT_NM AS TRANS_CLNT_CD_NM , M.TRANS_AMT , M.TRANS_ORDRS_CO_CD , M.TRANS_ORDRS_NO , CM.CLNT_PJT AS CLNT_PJT , FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(CM.CLNT_PJT) AS CLNT_PJT_NM , CM.ORDRS_CLNT_CD AS CUST_ID , D.CLNT_NM AS CUST_NM , M.TRANS_RMK , M.TRANS_PMNT_MTD_CD , FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(M.TRANS_PMNT_MTD_CD) AS TRANS_PMNT_MTD_CD_NM , M.TRANS_CLMN_DAY , TO_CHAR(M.TRANS_PMNT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS TRANS_PMNT_DT , M.CREAT_ID , (SELECT FN_CM06M01_ID_TO_NM(M.CREAT_ID) FROM DUAL) CREAT_ID_NM , M.CREAT_PGM , TO_CHAR(M.CREAT_DTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CREAT_DTTM , M.UDT_ID , M.UDT_PGM , TO_CHAR(M.UDT_DTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS UDT_DTTM FROM TB_TR01M01 M LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_BM02M01 B ON M.TRANS_CLNT_CD = B.CLNT_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_BM02M01 BF ON M.TRANS_FROM = BF.CLNT_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_BM02M01 BT ON M.TRANS_TO = BT.CLNT_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CR02M01 CM ON CM.CO_CD = M.TRANS_ORDRS_CO_CD AND CM.ORDRS_NO = M.TRANS_ORDRS_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_BM02M01 D ON D.CLNT_CD = CM.ORDRS_CLNT_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CM06M01 U ON U.ID = M.TRANS_MNG_ID WHERE 1=1
AND M.CO_CD = #{coCd}
AND M.TRANS_DT BETWEEN TO_DATE( #{reqDtFrom},'YYYYMMDD') AND TO_DATE( #{reqDtTo},'YYYYMMDD')
AND M.TRANS_ORDRS_NO LIKE '%'||#{ordrsNo}||'%'
AND BF.CLNT_NM LIKE '%'||#{transFromNm}||'%'
AND BT.CLNT_NM LIKE '%'||#{transToNm}||'%'
AND U.NAME LIKE '%'||#{mngIdNm}||'%'
AND NVL2(M.TRANS_PMNT_DT,'Y','N') = #{cmpletYn} --지급일자가 있으면'Y'=지급, null 이면 'N'=미지급
ORDER BY M.CO_CD, M.TRANS_DT DESC, M.TRANS_FROM, M.TRANS_TO,M.TRANS_MNG_ID ) A ) T WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{firstIndex} AND #{lastIndex}

SELECT M.FILE_TRGT_KEY , M.CO_CD , TO_CHAR(M.TRANS_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS TRANS_DT , M.TRANS_MNG_ID , (SELECT FN_CM06M01_ID_TO_NM(M.TRANS_MNG_ID) FROM DUAL) TRANS_MNG_ID_NM , M.TRANS_FROM , BF.CLNT_NM AS TRANS_FROM_NM , M.TRANS_TO , BT.CLNT_NM AS TRANS_TO_NM , M.TRANS_TYPE , M.TRANS_VEHICLE , M.TRANS_WEIGHT , M.TRANS_CLNT_CD , B.CLNT_NM AS TRANS_CLNT_CD_NM , M.TRANS_AMT , M.TRANS_ORDRS_CO_CD , M.TRANS_ORDRS_NO , CM.CLNT_PJT AS CLNT_PJT , FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(CM.CLNT_PJT) AS CLNT_PJT_NM , CM.ORDRS_CLNT_CD AS CUST_ID , D.CLNT_NM AS CUST_NM , M.TRANS_RMK , M.TRANS_PMNT_MTD_CD , M.TRANS_CLMN_DAY , TO_CHAR(M.TRANS_PMNT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS TRANS_PMNT_DT , M.CREAT_ID , M.CREAT_PGM , TO_CHAR(M.CREAT_DTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CREAT_DTTM , M.UDT_ID , M.UDT_PGM , TO_CHAR(M.UDT_DTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS UDT_DTTM FROM TB_TR01M01 M LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_BM02M01 B ON M.TRANS_CLNT_CD = B.CLNT_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_BM02M01 BF ON M.TRANS_FROM = BF.CLNT_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_BM02M01 BT ON M.TRANS_TO = BT.CLNT_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CR02M01 CM ON CM.CO_CD = M.TRANS_ORDRS_CO_CD AND CM.ORDRS_NO = M.TRANS_ORDRS_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_BM02M01 D ON D.CLNT_CD = CM.ORDRS_CLNT_CD WHERE M.FILE_TRGT_KEY = #{fileTrgtKey}
